item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0301; 07:13AM; 1536 E 102nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S8gvIY; Watts; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighter extinguished the fire in 23 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters located and contained the fire within two hallways in the structure, preventing it from extending throughout. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E233 E264 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 RA865 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0301; 06:50AM; 1536 E 102nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BIlkDa; Watts; One story commercial building, approximately 75' x 100', with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There are no other buildings exposed.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E233 E264 E64 E65 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1501; 06:55PM; 8447 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Sn4oYH; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighter extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The building is a vacant commercial structure and the fire was contained to a contents fire only. No further details.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E24 E289 E298 E60 E98 RA98 T89 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1501; 06:38PM; 8447 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Sn4oYH; Sun Valley; One story, commercial building with heavy smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E24 E289 E298 E60 E98 T89 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Auto Fire - Now Out; INC#1429; 06:10PM; 11201 W Pendleton St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3a6ah8l; Sun Valley; Firefighters extinguished four vehicles, well-involved in fire, at an auto junkyard with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. The 9-1-1 call was received at 5:55PM. No further details. ; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 E260 E274 E289 E298 E77 E89 E98 T60 T74 T89 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0422; 08:58AM; 1622 S Stearns Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Dl0on7; Mid-City; KNOCKDOWN: 41 firefighters extinguished the fire in 37 minutes with no injuries reported. The bulk of the fire was located in the attic, running the walls which had to be opened up to chase down all remaining fire and smoldering spots. The incident commander requested LAFD Arson and LAPD respond for a potential suspect. While a knockdown was called, firefighters will continue working an area around the chimney (which had heavy fire) to ensure no hot spots remain. No further details.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 BC9 E226 E261 E292 E58 E61 E68 EM18 RA58 RA858 RA92 T26 T61 T92; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0422; 08:21AM; 1622 S Stearns Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Dl0on7; Mid-City; Two story duplex with heavy smoke showing from the attic vents. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and report the first floor is clear. One additional task force requested.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E261 E292 E58 E68 RA58 T61 T92; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0160; 04:25AM; 231 N Westlake Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xmvvuM; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters extinguished the fire in 27 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire extended into the attic on both units of the duplex. This is a vacant structure and there was a partial roof collapse. The primary and secondary searches were clear with no occupants located. No further details. ; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 E11 E20 E203 E211 E220 RA20 SQ21 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0160; 03:58AM; 231 N Westlake Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xmvvuM; Westlake; One story duplex with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 E11 E20 E203 E211 E220 RA20 SQ21 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Confined Space Rescue; INC#0033; 12:38AM; 5927 W Imperial Hw; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Bdr7PK; Westchester; One approximately 30yo male patient transported after being pulled unconscious from an aircraft fuel tank after performing maintenance (commercial cargo plane). Patient is in unknown condition. Five additional patients are being evaluated and are not expected to require hospital transport. No further details.; FS 95; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC13 BC4 BC9 E205 E27 E288 E295 E51 E88 E95 EM9 HR3 RA51 RA64 RA862 RA867 RA95 T5 T88 T95 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart
